title: Dice Roller
subtitle: A Random Dice Generator for RPG Campaigns

navbar.inscription_body: This tool is yet under active tests and experimentation. We still don't allow Roll creation to be used publicly, but if you want to be a Beta-tester of this tool, we can add you! All you have to do is to send an e-mail to tendadogoblin@gmail.com with the subject 'I want to use Dice Roller'
navbar.inscription_title: Do you want to be a tester?
